desc: Fresh, Delicious, Homemade, Handcrafted, Curry Pies,

layout.text:
ROTI PIES SINCE 2018
Combining authentic homemade curry in a light & crispy roti we promise you will not find a more tasty or unique pie anywhere!
Roti Pies are made fresh each day from the Newport Pie Hole and filled to the brim with the finest, freshest, tastiest ingredients.
ROTI PIES DELIVERY SERVICE IS BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND.
From April you can order boxes of 6 Roti Pies for a Friday delivery anywhere on Sydney's Northern Beaches
